desc: At Mirror Mirror, we believe every child deserves to see themselves reflected in the pages of a storybook. Mirror Mirror Books help parents prepare their children for life’s big moments, and allow kids of all backgrounds to see themselves in the pages of storybooks that will shape their childhoods.

layout.text: We create picture books that help little kids handle life's big moments
Use our delightful new book,The Day I Beat the Germs, to help your child cope with the COVID-19 pandemic.
